code: import React from"react";import{Ticket,Clock,CheckCircle,AlertCircle}from"lucide-react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const StatsCards=_ref=>{let{stats}=_ref;const cards=[{title:"Total Tickets",value:(stats===null||stats===void 0?void 0:stats.total)||0,icon:Ticket,color:"bg-blue-500",bgColor:"bg-blue-50"},{title:"Open Tickets",value:(stats===null||stats===void 0?void 0:stats.open)||0,icon:Clock,color:"bg-yellow-500",bgColor:"bg-yellow-50"},{title:"In Progress",value:(stats===null||stats===void 0?void 0:stats.inProgress)||0,icon:AlertCircle,color:"bg-orange-500",bgColor:"bg-orange-50"},{title:"Resolved",value:(stats===null||stats===void 0?void 0:stats.resolved)||0,icon:CheckCircle,color:"bg-green-500",bgColor:"bg-green-50"}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-4",children:cards.map((card,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"".concat(card.bgColor," rounded-lg p-6 border border-gray-200 hover:shadow-lg transition-shadow"),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center justify-between",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-sm font-medium text-gray-600",children:card.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mt-2",children:card.value})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"".concat(card.color," p-3 rounded-lg"),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(card.icon,{className:"w-6 h-6 text-white"})})]})},index))});};export default StatsCards;
